description.narrative: IFC finance is expected to help Exim to expand term lending to SMEs, a vastly underserved sector in the country. The Banks local currency ROIC and EROIC are expected to exceed the Banks WACC by 4.0% and 5.1%, respectively, over the life of the project (2006-2012). IFCs investment will permit the Bank to extend finance of up to $5 million to at least 100 new women owned SME projects by end December 2007 assuming an average loan size of $50,000.
